name: After-Before
description:
Game created by Drew White for MI 445, Project 1.

Modification #1 - Added the 'time swap' mechanic that allows the player to swap between two time points using Left Shift.  A time swap includes changes in level design, lighting, and music.

Modification #2 - Created three levels based around the time swap mechanic. Also created a 'backstory' page giving the basis and mood for the game. Main menu is changed to show the game's mechanic.

Modification #3 - Created and added music (made in Ableton) that changes based on what time the player is within. Also added extra sound effects and tuned overall audio.

With Assets from MSU

Swap Sound "Low short sound" Provided by Jamelle Jager On freesound.org.
